TIMEOUT_BYPASS.PED_ROBBING: Excessive ped-robbing! (Bypassed server-timeout, most likely using an injector to accomplish this.)
TIMEOUT_BYPASS.ZOMBIE_LOOTING: Excessive zombie looting! (Bypassed server-timeout, most likely using an injector to accomplish this.)

ILLEGAL_VALUES.RADIO_FREQUENCY: Attempting to access illegal radio frequencies.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.FIRE_EXTINGUISHER_MODEL: Attempted to delete a fire extinguisher on all clients with a model that wasn't a fire extinguisher.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.SECURITY_CAMERAS: Attempting to tamper with illegal security cameras.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.EXTERNAL_SOUND_EFFECT: Attempted to tell other clients to play an external sound effect.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.PED_OBJECT: Attempting to add a ped object not in the 'allowed' list of ped objects.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.SHOOTING_RANGE: Attempting to pass invalid values for shootings spots.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.INVALID_SHOOTING_SPOT: Attempting to pass values for a shootings spot that doesn't exist.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.PAWN_SHOP: Attempting to pass values for a pawn shop that doesn't exist.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.WEATHER_NAME: Attempting to use a weather spell with an illegal weather name.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.BURGER_SHOT_DELIVERY_ITEM_ID: Attempting to use a burger shot delivery item with with an illegal item id.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.BOOMBOX_ITEM_ID: Attempting to use a boombox item with with an illegal item id.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.LIGHTER_ITEM_ID: Attempting to use a lighter item with with an illegal item id.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.PROP_ITEM_ID: Player attempted to use a prop item with with an illegal item id.
